messages.subject: Pen/email pals?
messages.msgSnippet: Is there anyone on here who has someone that wants to write to a 10 year old boy?  My son would love to talk to other kids but is afraid of the chats all of a
messages.messageBody:
Is there anyone on here who has someone that wants to write to a 10 year
old boy? My son would love to talk to other kids but is afraid of the
chats all of a sudden but misses the daily communication with kids his age
since we have started unschooling.

His email is MathieuRyan@... if you have a child that would like
to. It would be a nice surprise for him to get email from someone other
than me :o)

His fav. things are digimon, pokemon, robots, animals, and probably about a
gazillion other things !

Thanks

Jessi





<<**<<**<<**<<**<<**<<**<<**<<**<<**<<**
Too often we give children answers to remember rather than problems to solve.
~ Roger Lewin ~
<<**<<**<<**<<**<<**<<**<<**<<**<<**<<**
